Package dev.lazurite.thimble.composition

Class Composition

java.lang.Object
dev.lazurite.thimble.composition.Composition
Direct Known Subclasses:
FloatAwayComposition, TimeBombComposition
public abstract class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
The main class that you want to extend from. This class allows you to define custom behavior for any Entity with a Composition stitched to it.
Author:
Ethan Johnson

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Synchronizer synchronizer
    The Synchronizer used for syncing values between the client and the server.

    The default constructor.

  • Field Details

    • synchronizer

      private final Synchronizer synchronizer
      The Synchronizer used for syncing values between the client and the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Composition

      public Composition​(Synchronizer synchronizer)
      The default constructor. It creates and initializes the Synchronizer object.

  • Method Details

    • onTick

      public abstract void onTick​(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity)
      This is where you can define your ticking custom behavior. An override of this method is required when you extend this class.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity which this Composition is attached to

    • onInteract

      public abstract boolean onInteract​(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player, net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
      Called whenever a PlayerEntity interacts with the Entity that this Composition is stitched into.
      Parameters:
      entity - the Entity who has the Composition stitched
      player - the PlayerEntity who is interacting
      hand - the Hand of the PlayerEntity
      Returns:
      whether or not the player should swing their hand

    • onRemove

      public abstract void onRemove​(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity)
      Called whenever the Entity is removed from the World.
      Parameters:
      entity - the Entity who has the Composition stitched

    • initSynchronizer

      public abstract void initSynchronizer()
      Initializes the Synchronizer. This is where you would call Synchronizer.track(dev.lazurite.thimble.synchronizer.key.SynchronizedKey<T>).

    • getIdentifier

      public abstract net.minecraft.util.Identifier getIdentifier()
      Returns:
      the Identifier object that you define in your Composition implementation.

    • getSynchronizer

      public Synchronizer getSynchronizer()
      Returns:
      the Synchronizer object

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
